name: Coots Cat Commando
description:
Looks like this cat is out of the bag…

COOTS: CAT COMMANDO is a top-down actionboss battle game inspired by the macho-men titles of 80s arcade cabinets. Join Coots on her mission to save her friend Ders from the clutches of Ludwig. Enjoy the custom artwork, enemies, and music of each level! And most importantly, have a good time.

MADE FOR THE LUDWIG JAM 2023 / PLEASE RATE HIGHLY!
